QuestData.Title: Make it Mildenhall
QuestData.Description:
You've no doubt enjoyed a mug or three of world-famous Mildenhall Mead in your local tavern. Today is your day to become a part of the official meadery of Stormsong Valley!
Ideal applicants have a hunger for craft mead, honey, and boundless innovation. Military experience recommended, but not required.
Must not be allergic to bees.
Mildenhall Mead - Make it Mildenhall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ancel Mildenhall at the Mildenhall Meadery.
